review: I had visited dr Soumya for my stomach pain which turned out to be UTI. She was really helpful and kind during the entire process. She was patient and listened to all of my concerns. As a precaution she recommended few tests and kept the the tab of the results too. I felt very comfortable consulting her.I would definitely recommend her.
Attendent should be always there to attend patients and manage the queue. Otherwise nobody know when they need to visit doctor.

Really sweet, really nice to talk to... *** *** ** *********** *** ****** ** **** ******* *********
But first made us spend about 15k on tests that's all came out negative.

After which we backed out on getting admitted.
Takecare, make sure to meet another doctor before you do anything  with her.
